title: "바보 온달"
lang: ko
format:
  pdf:
    pdf-engine: xelatex
    classoption: landscape
    toc: false
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        \usepackage{graphicx}
        \usepackage{xcolor}
        \usepackage{tikz}
        \usetikzlibrary{calc}

        % Option C
        % - overlay 없음
        % - 중간 회색 텍스트 (출판용)
        % - 안전한 의사-그림자 (텍스트 2회 출력)

        % 페이지 전체 이미지 + 표지 제목 (중상단)
        \newcommand{\CoverPage}[2]{%
          \thispagestyle{empty}%
          \begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
            % background image
            \node[inner sep=0pt] at (current page.center) {%
              \includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight]{#1}%
            };

            % subtle highlight (very light, upward)
            \node[
              align=center,
              text=white,
              opacity=0.25,
              font=\bfseries\fontsize{44}{52}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.north)+(0,-0.22\paperheight)+(0.07\paperwidth,0)+(0,0.6pt)$) {#2};

            % main text (neutral gray)
            \node[
              align=center,
              text={rgb,255:red,68;green,68;blue,68}, % #444444
              font=\bfseries\fontsize{44}{52}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.north)+(0,-0.22\paperheight)+(0.07\paperwidth,0)$) {#2};
          \end{tikzpicture}
        }

        % 페이지 전체 이미지 + 하단 자막 (중앙)
        \newcommand{\ScenePage}[2]{%
          \thispagestyle{empty}%
          \begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
            % background image
            \node[inner sep=0pt] at (current page.center) {%
              \includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight]{#1}%
            };

            % strong shadow
            \node[
              align=center,
              text=black,
              opacity=0.65,
              font=\fontsize{26}{32}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.south)+(0,0.04\paperheight)+(0,-1.4pt)$) {#2};

            % mid shadow
            \node[
              align=center,
              text=black,
              opacity=0.35,
              font=\fontsize{26}{32}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.south)+(0,0.04\paperheight)+(0,-0.7pt)$) {#2};

            % main text (warm off-white)
            \node[
              align=center,
              text={rgb,255:red,236;green,230;blue,216}, % #ece6d8
              font=\fontsize{26}{32}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.south)+(0,0.04\paperheight)$) {#2};
          \end{tikzpicture}
        }
mainfont: "Noto Serif CJK KR"
